span.span: The root activity.

summary.span: 返回一个 ，它表示与输入活动关联的所有活动。

span.span: Returns an that represents all activities associated with the input activity.

returns.span: 一个表示与输入活动关联的所有活动的枚举。

span.span: An enumeration that represents all activities associated with the input activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该枚举包含所有子活动、委托处理程序、变量默认值和自变量表达式。The enumeration contains all child activities, delegate handlers, variable defaults, and argument expressions. 如果输入活动为 `null` ， 则会引发。If the input activity is `null`, an is thrown. 在枚举活动树时，不得修改该树且不得调用 ，否则在调用 时会引发 。The activity tree must remain unmodified and must not be called while the tree is being enumerated or else an is thrown when is called. 调用此方法会导致完全缓存元数据。Calling this method causes a full cache metadata to occur. 如果在调用此方法后对工作流进行更改，则必须 在进行更改后调用方法才能重新缓存元数据。If you make changes to the workflow after calling this method, you must call the method after making the changes in order to re-cache the metadata.
